name: Plugin name: MM Ephemeride
author: MM Informatique

sections.description:
This plugin display a simple ephemeris everywhere you need on your wordpress site. It uses shortcode that you can use on pages, posts, widgets, etc.

Display options:
*Show / hide the date
*Change the sentence before the date
*Change the date display format
*Show / hide names to celebrate
*Show / hide sunrise and sunset times

Privacy

User Data: This plugin does not collect any user data.

Cookies: This plugin does not use cookies.

Services: This plugin does not connect to any third-party locations or services.

short_description: Simply display on your WordPress site: the current date, the Saints of the day and the times of sunrise and sunset. All this whith a shortcode.
